data.message: My son is a 12 year old Eminem! Obsession! In fact I used to be obsessed with you Em but my son's obsession drives me crazy. His dad just died of an od so I suppose your the one true constant in his life. Your always there when he needs you! He's getting pretty good at rapping himself. I make sure to educate him about the history of rap and listen to all kinds of music. And read! Get them words! We ❤️ you so much! Can't wait to see this movie. Please knock kid rock off his high horse.

replies.message: He should listen to Stan, then write a letter to him to get in contact at a show
2PAC is The Better .eminem told « 2pac Best singer in the history , he is the king of rap ,,REST IN PEACE »
